messages.title: Securing a better future for Hampstead and Kilburn
messages.content: The most important issue in a generation - securing your economic recovery.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Long term economic plan delivering a growing economy with falling unemployment.
Increase NHS spending every year, no hospital parking charges for certain groups.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Best schools and skills for young people, over 3,000 more apprenticeships.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Barking Neighbourhood Recycling Plant. Protect local parks.

issues.brexitEurope: With Prime Minister David Cameron re-negotiating Britain's relationship with Europe, your vote will be doubly important.
issues.economy: Long term economic plan that has seen unemployment fall and a recovering economy.
issues.education: Best schools and skills for young people, over 3,000 more apprenticeships.
issues.environment: Barking Neighbourhood Recycling Plant. Protect local parks.
issues.health: Increase NHS spending every year, no hospital parking charges for certain groups.

housing.content: Savings on housing benefit. Protect the character of our neighbourhoods.

leaflet.personalStatement: Simon Marcus - I learnt so much from running a small business, volunteering, and by being a councillor.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contrasts 'Competent Leadership' with 'Coalition of Chaos' and includes images endorsing the candidate with captions such as 'Securing a better future for Hampstead and Kilburn' and 'My plan to secure a better future for Hampstead and Kilburn.'
